name: creepy

strange or unnatural and making you feel frightened: a creepy film a creepy smile
unpleasant and making you feel uncomfortable, especially because of sexual behaviour that is not wanted or not appropriate: She got pestered by a creepy cab driver. In our culture, a friendship between an 11-year-old girl and a 36-year-old man is considered creepy.
